mapper.select: select count(rob.robot_id) as value from mly_robot rob

select rob.robot_id, rob.account, rob.nickname, rob.species_id, date_format(rob.birthday,'%Y-%m-%d') as birthday, rob.gender, rob.comefrom, rob.hobby, rob.comment, spe.species_name as species_name from mly_robot rob left join mly_species spe on rob.species_id=spe.species_id where rob.robot_id = #{robotId}
mapper.update: update mly_robot rob set rob.robot_id=#{robotId}, rob.account=#{account}, rob.nickname=#{nickname}, rob.species_id=#{speciesId}, rob.birthday=STR_TO_DATE(#{birthday},'%Y-%c-%d'), rob.gender=#{gender}, rob.comefrom=#{comefrom}, rob.hobby=#{hobby}, rob.comment=#{comment} where rob.robot_id=#{robotId}
